summary: Both REQ-56 and REQ-57 are substantially implemented. OrderCard.tsx now shows exactly two action buttons (Deliver and Delete) with confirmation prompt and orange styling. OrderFilters.tsx now shows only All, Pending, Delivered, and Cancelled tabs. CourierApp.tsx uses the simplified workflow. One minor concern: the Deliver action in CourierApp.tsx uses only optimistic local state rather than calling the actual updateOrderStatus backend mutation, which may not fully satisfy the AC requiring it to call the appropriate backend mutation.

missing_requirements.requirement: Clicking 'Deliver' marks the order as 'delivered' by calling the appropriate backend mutation (updateOrderStatus).
missing_requirements.reason: In CourierApp.tsx, handleDeliver only sets local optimistic state and invalidates the query cache — it does not actually call updateOrderStatus on the backend. The comment explicitly states 'Optimistic update — backend lacks updateOrderStatus', meaning the backend mutation is never invoked.
